alert.note: Alert for Saline (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 09 at 9:45PM CDT until June 09 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Saline County in central Kansas... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 945 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Culver, or 13 miles southwest of Minneapolis, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Glendale. This includes Interstate 70 between Mile Markers 236 and 247. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
